projects.name: Smart Shopping List
projects.description: 'Smart' shopping list application that learns user's buying habbits and reminds them of when items will next need to be purchased
projects.techstack: React, React Router, JavaScript, HTML, Tailwind, Firebase

projects.name: Flags of the World
projects.description: Responsive single page application built with React. Integrates the REST Countries API to display country flags and inforamtion with searching and filtering options.
projects.techstack: React, React Router, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

projects.name: Authenticate Me
projects.description: Full-Stack authentication workflow with account creation, log in, and log out functionality. Passwords are hashed and salted with bcrypt, and JSON web tokens (JWT) are used to ensure only logged in users can access protected enpoints.
projects.techstack: React, React Router, Redux Toolkit, JavaScript, HTML, Bootstrap, Node.js, Express, Sequelize, PostgreSQL

projects.name: Tip Split Calculator
projects.description: Responsive calculator application built with React. Calculates tip and total cost of bill per person.
